plot: Siegfried is a suicidal swan who wants to be eaten up. Green witch is a vegan who refuses to eat him up although she thinks that he looks delicious.
title: Siegfried a la Carte
plot_es: Siegfried is a suicidal swan who wants to be eaten up. Green witch is a vegan who refuses to eat him up although she thinks that he looks delicious.
plot_en: Siegfried is a suicidal swan who wants to be eaten up. Green witch is a vegan who refuses to eat him up although she thinks that he looks delicious.
